name: Gunbo
description:
Gunbo is a western themed top down shooter, inspired by the likes of Nuclear Throne, Enter the Gungeon, and Westerado.

Procedural Generation

Fight through procedurally generated levels in two areas, with a variety of challenging enemies.

Boss Fights

Defeat brutally difficult bosses.

Hub World

Converse with the people of the desert.

Though, the game is free, I'd greatly appreciate a small donation thanks to the time, effort, money and love that has gone into creating a project of this scale throughout the past year.
